snippet: If the aerospace giants agree to a transaction, the two companies would not actually combine. Instead, they would probably enter into a complex, dual-listed company structure.
abstract: If the aerospace giants agree to a transaction, the two companies would not actually combine. Instead, they would probably enter into a complex, dual-listed company structure.

headline.main: The Many Complexities of an EADS-BAE Merger
